summary: Male only Khajiit Armor, sneak and shoot types.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Jera is the rune for wise patience, reaping what you sow. 

intent was a simple yet practical armor that is simply well done

IF YOU ONLY WANT THE SWORD IT IS BEING ADDED AS A SEPARATE MOD 

UBR NOT REQUIRED FILE - DETAILS BELOW

REASON
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78569/?
[/size]
[size=3]the main body is a black linen warrior dress over a full body leather armor. 

-made at forge- use leather 
-tamper- use leather
-enchantable- slots used body, hands, feet 

sculpted (although its kinda hard to tell and im no artist) 
weight painted very well, very little clipping and does reasonably well with modded animations 
-clipping with 2 handed weapon swing when standing still- this i don't have time to fix 

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/22787489-1473254849.jpg[/img]

for male khajiit only if someone wants to make it for females or other races you are welcome to

[/size]extra notes 

-leather skirt has volume the armor is not double sided (for modelers)
-custom animations that do not use skirt bones will end badly (sadly) 

-requires the UBR Unique Beast Races 
-http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74833/?

Highly recommend using xp 32 Skeleton,
This mod may not work with certain skeleton replacers 

Vanilla and xp 32 extended skeleton does work to my knowledge

-if for some reason you cant get the armor try console command "help Jera" then player.add.item IDcode number
-if the armor does not show up then the mod did not install correctly

I may continue to work on this armor add stuff armor etc. but will be awhile 

this is my first mod so just let me know if it is buggy or does not work, i will do my best.

-the ground objects are simple vanilla meshes - combat robes are fine clothes - gloves are mystic dawn gloves - feet covers - merchant boots


-retextures of khajiit body may not work well - see UBR 
-retextures of armor will work to my understanding 
-recommend racemenu to alter size of person 
-no body slider just a 0 weight size which is why i recommend racemenu
-the reason being is that this armor is weightpainted extremely tight meaning there is little to no room to change the vertices in the mesh
-no clipping while running and looks natural being the intent


for modders 
-for this armor
-Combat robes
-if you use blender or whatever do not delete the weights or vertex groups when altering the armor unless you are amazing at weight painting by hand
-if you need help you can mesg me, ill try to help as much as i can and give resources

[size=4]UPDATE version 1.1[/size]

Added the sword Reason and Reason Unhindered
-they come in sword and dagger versions-the reason being that i checked the weight of the actual sword you can purchase and its less than 4 lbs
-dagger version can be equipped to back hip using xpmse 

-swords and daggers come in 2 versions
-one set has a polished wood scabbard
-one set has just the weapons no scabbard


-added wearable earrings made of horker tusk 
-comes in two version one is visible, one is invisible
-it is impossible to weight paint for facial animations/expressions so the visible earrings will clip through head 
-if this bothers you, you can put on the invisible earrings 

Earrings are enchantable with No Enchantment restrictions mod found here 
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40425/?
-visible earring 1 takes slot 52
-visible earring 2 takes slot 53
-invisible earring 3 takes slot 54
-invisible earring 4 takes slot 55

Armor 
-added ground and world models
-allows female khajiits to wear armor however it looks bad and i dont have much interest making a female version
-altered the robes white leather and darken the leather a little 


Please let me know if there are any bugs

[size=4]
******* I believe i found a work around so that UBR is not a required file however it involves a few simple steps, Credits and Thanks still go to UBR, however if you want UBR to associate only to this armor-meaning if your not wearing this armor, beast races will go back to Vanilla. retextures will not work for the skin/fur of this armor only. please mesg me if you need this. I think UBR is awesome so i am making this a mesg only details. ************

[/size][size=5]UPDATE: UBR NOT REQUIRED
[/size]
[size=3]Download the Main File v1.1 or v1.0 (v1.1 is better and has a pointy stick added) 
Download the Optional UBR NOT REQUIRED file MANUALLY (Do not use NEXUS MOD MANAGER FOR THIS ONE)
Extract the contents
INSTRUCTIONS are in the folder in a README file
Follow the Steps EXACTLY and you wont have a bad time

EST TIME to get this working 5 to 10 mins at most

What does this do? 
This file will replace the mods .esp with a new one. This new .esp makes it so that while wearing the Jera Scout Armor your Khajiit will have UBR properties such as digitigrade like feet with claws and awesome hand claws. When you take off the armor, Your Khajiit will go back to Vanilla - plantigrade feet and no awesome hand claws.

This also means that All Khajiit in Skyrim are Vanilla, if you give this Armor to a Khajiit follower, they will have UBR as well


Issues
if you download Khajiit retextures/skin textures, these textures may conflict with this armor only, should not affect anything else. i have not tested this, just a fair warning.
[/size]
UPDATE PLEASE READ
Received a mesg saying that UBR not required file caused a crash on their game. After several mesgs and troubleshooting attempts, i believe that the issue is a mod conflict and not a problem with this particular mod. I am asking if anyone downloads this alternative solution to the mod that they mesg me or comment in the comment section if this alternate download method worked for them. 

please comment if this solution did or did not work for you. i want to provide good mods so please let me know. i will do what i can to make this mod work for you.

Solution to above problem was a conflict with skeleton 
The person downloaded xp 32 extended skeleton and the armor worked after installation.


recommended mods
-ubr link above 
-Real Bows http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64440/?
-Race Menu http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?
-fnis peca2 http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71055/?
-tk hitstop http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23681/?
-tk recoil http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32769/?
-ABT- for archers http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11941/?
-Sxp http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40899/?
-equipping overhaul http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49784/?
-casm-auto save http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/67188/?
-archery gameplay overhaul http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69033/?
-blades samurai armour and kimonos http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24704/?

and many more but these are friendly to low end graphics cards like mine
author: PocMouse
